com.apple.audio.util
Class AudioBufferList

java.lang.Object
  com.apple.audio.CAObject
      com.apple.audio.util.CAMemoryObject
          com.apple.audio.util.AudioBufferList
public class AudioBufferList
extends CAMemoryObject

Represents a single buffer of audio passed to and/or from the IOProc. This structure is passed to an application by the IOProc and IS ONLY VALID for the duration of that IOProc.execute call.

If an application wishes to retain copies or references to the data of a particular IO execution cycle, the user code must copy the data.

public AudioBuffer getBuffer(int index)
                      throws CAOutOfBoundsException
Returns:
the AudioBuffer at the specified index. This index is ZERO based
Throws:
